plugin.Name: Appium
plugin.Description:
Supports Functional testing using Appium on Android[4.4-5.1] as well as iOS[8.1] on Device/Simulator.
Supports Functional testing using AppiumVersion 1.4.13.1

Setting.Name: XMLHttpRequestTimeOut
Setting.Description: Provide Wait(in seconds) for XMLHttpRequest to complete. Default WaitTime is 5 seconds

Setting.Name: UseWaitForPageLoad
Setting.Description: Check this to wait for page load.

Setting.Name: UseWaitForAngularLoad
Setting.Description: Check this to wait for Angular to load

Setting.Name: UseWaitForJQueryLoad
Setting.Description: Check this to wait for JQuery to load

Setting.Name: UseWaitForXMLHttpRequestLoad
Setting.Description: Check this to wait for XMLHttpRequest to load

Setting.Name: Host
Setting.Description: Leave it blank in case of autostart. If appium server is started mannually, Give the Host Address of the Remote Appium Server.

Setting.Name: Port
Setting.Description: Leave it blank in case of autostart. If appium server is started mannually, Give the Port Number of the Remote Appium Server.

Setting.Name: RunAppInBackground
Setting.Description: provide true to run app in background

Setting.Name: AppiumServer
Setting.Description: Give the path of the Appium.exe.

Setting.Name: CheckFoundedElementVisibility
Setting.Description: True if wants to check finded element visibility else false.
